remarks: The value of the functionalized Hom-set operation in the category of non-unital rings (in a universe) in maps-to notation for an operation. (Contributed by AV, 1-Mar-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
rngchomffvalOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngchomffvalOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngchomffvalOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngchomffvalOLD.h $e |- F = ( Homf ` C ) $.
rngchomffvalOLD $p |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x RngHomo y ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d ph x y $.
